Layout/MultilineAssignmentLayout.description:
Description

Checks for a newline after the assignment operator in multi-line assignments.
Layout/MultilineAssignmentLayout.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

SupportedTypes: ['block', 'case', 'class', 'if', 'kwbegin', 'module'] (type: list)
EnforcedStyle: new_line (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['same_line', 'new_line'] (type: list)
